main.name: Bruce Molina
main.description: An analytical and adaptable Web Designer seeking a Backend Developer position that will allow me to utilize scripting languages like Python, Ruby and Node.JS to deliver complex web applications and seamless solutions for end-users.
main.bio: Born and raised in NYC, I grew up around technology.  My father ran a web development company when I was around 12 and have been a computer-geek ever since (and proud of it).  I am also a mechanical keyboard enthusiast.  I build and use my creations as tools to enhance my development skills.  You can see some of the keyboards I have built in in the Project section of my website.  As far as web programming/development, I am mainly proficient in Python, JavaScript/React HTML and CSS.  I regularly use them as well as other modules/libraries such as MatPlotLib, Pandas, Numpy and Seaborn.  I have also been studying Sentiment Analysis, and my LivingNovel.io application puts python modules such as NLTK and Vader to great use.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
